1370: Didewar was born in Appel Marckt in 1370.
Got married to Rabburgis at age 18 in 1370.
1371: Had a daughter with Rabburgis, Aleydis, at age 19.
1372: Lost daughter Meynseth when Meynseth was 0 years old.
Rabburgis gave birth to their stillborn daughter Meynseth in 1372.
1375: Had a son with Rabburgis, Elyasа, at age 23.
1380: Lost son Elyasа when Elyasа was 6 years old.
1384: Lost daughter Aleydis when Aleydis was 14 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
